Diana: "Charlie's right, we need to focus on finding the killer. I didn't notice anything suspicious, but we should all share if we saw anything unusual."
Diana: "Bob, you seemed quick to agree with Charlie. Do you have any thoughts on who might be suspicious?"
Charlie: "I'm concerned about the sudden death of Alice. Bob, your quick agreement with Charlie made me wonder if you have any information that you haven't shared yet."

You: "I want to remind everyone that we need to stay focused and work together to identify the culprit. I didn't notice anything suspicious myself, but I encourage everyone to share any information they may have."

Charlie was arrested
